DamageImmunities: Poison, Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Memory Wipe
Traits.Content: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the Hollow File must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or have its memory of the last minute erased.

Traits.Name: Evasive Nature
Traits.Content: The Hollow File has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that would cause it to be hit or affected.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Hollow File makes two attacks: one with Memory Drain and one with Erasure Touch.

Actions.Name: Memory Drain
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) psychic damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or have its memories of the past hour forgotten.

Actions.Name: Erasure Touch
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) force damage, and if the target is a creature with an active spell, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or lose the spell!
